text:
There is a typo in the code on the line that requests CollectionManager service.
It should be 
CollectionManager manager =
(CollectionManager)collection.getService("CollectionManager", "1.0");

Note service name is "CollectionManager", was "CollectionManger".

Because of the typo service could not be found, later it threw NullPointerException.

Please check the original example, if the typo originated there, let us know, so
it can be fixed.
